summary: Drive Level feature testing PASSED. All core functionality verified: slider works (25%-100%), dead key/peak values scale correctly with 4:1 ratio preserved, power output and current draw both reduced at lower drive levels, custom equipment still available.

integration_issues.issue: Signal Chain Summary section does not reflect drive level - shows full power (e.g., '50W') regardless of drive setting. The calculateSignalChain() calls in EquipmentRack.js lines 190 and 199 are missing the driveLevel parameter.

passed_tests: Drive Level slider exists with data-testid='drive-level-slider' - PASS
Drive Level shows percentage display (100%, 50%, 25%) - PASS
At 100%: Cobra 29 shows DEAD KEY: 1W, PEAK: 4W (full values) - PASS
At 50%: Cobra 29 shows DEAD KEY: 0.5W, PEAK: 2W (scaled correctly) - PASS
4:1 watt ratio preserved at all drive levels - PASS
At 25%: Shows DEAD KEY: 0.25W, PEAK: 1W (minimum drive) - PASS
Drive affects signal chain: At 50% drive, 2-pill driver outputs 25W vs 50W at 100% - PASS
Drive affects current draw: At 50% draw is 2.5A vs 4.6A at 100% - PASS
Power meter shows correct watts when keyed (50W at 100%, 25W at 50%) - PASS
Peak meter shows correct watts (matches power in dead key state) - PASS
Custom equipment 'Cobra 29 Ltd (Modded)' (0.75W) appears in Radio dropdown - PASS
KEY DOWN button works with mousedown (data-testid='key-down-btn') - PASS
action_items: LOW PRIORITY: Update Signal Chain Summary to pass driveLevel to calculateSignalChain() - lines 190 and 199 in EquipmentRack.js should include config.driveLevel parameter
critical_code_review_comments: EquipmentRack.js Signal Chain Summary calls calculateSignalChain() without driveLevel parameter - should be: calculateSignalChain(config.radio, config.driverAmp, 'none', config.bonding, config.antennaPosition, config.driveLevel)
RFContext.js correctly passes driveLevel to all calculation functions in metrics computation
rfEngine.js calculateSignalChain and calculateStageOutputs correctly use driveLevel parameter when provided
KeyButton component has proper data-testid='key-down-btn' for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Drive Level feature fully functional. Slider range is 0.25-1.0 (25%-100%). At 50% drive with Cobra 29 + 2-pill driver: radio outputs 0.5W/2W (not 1W/4W), driver amplifies to 25W (not 50W), current draw is 2.5A (not 4.6A). The ONLY issue is the Signal Chain Summary box at bottom of Equipment Rack doesn't show drive-adjusted values - it always shows full power. This is cosmetic/informational only and doesn't affect actual simulation calculations.
